prereq.p: You'll need access to a kitchen for this, including:

taskbody.context: How to prepare and cook the tofu fried chicken.

step.cmd: Heat a large pot of oil on the stove.
Cut the tofu block into 1/4 - 1/3 inch wide slices by cutting along the long side of the block.
Press paper towels into the slices to drain the excess water
Lightly season with salt and pepper
Mix the flax eggs, almond milk, and hot sauce in a medium-sized bowl
Mix the flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper into a shallow baking dish
Dip the tofu slices into the hot sauce mixture
Dip the hot sauce mix covered slices into the flour mixture
step.stepresult: The slice should be evenly and entirely coated with both mixtures.

step.cmd: Fry the slices in the hot oil for 2-3 minutes or until golden brown and crispy
step.info: For faster cooking, fry one slice at a time. The oil will cool less and cook faster.
